testStep.functionId: Step ${MasterStep}.1 Precondition: Ensure that the subscriptPreconditionFailureFlag variable is set to false. The test case set the value to ${SubscriptPreconditionFailureFlag}.
Step ${MasterStep}.2 This step is only executed if the Precondition Step 1 was true.
Step ${MasterStep}.3 This step is only executed if the Precondition Step 1 was true and Step 2 passed.
